body: This spell functions like lesser planar ally, except that you may call a single creature of 18 HD or less, or up to three creatures of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 18. The creatures agree to help you and request your return payment together.
description: As lesser planar ally, but up to 18 HD.
component_text: V, S, M (offerings worth 2,500 gp plus payment), DF
descriptor_text: see text for lesser planar ally

effects.text: up to three called outsiders, totaling no more than 18 HD, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart when they appear.
effects.name: Effect

name: Planar Ally, Greater
